Description:
Desired Skills and Experience:University degree in computer science / business administration / project management
Experience in IT in a large multinational company or company being service provider to multinational company
3 years+ experience in Project Delivery either as project analyst or stream lead,
Evidenced vendor management
Evidenced operations efficiency lead initiatives
Fundamental knowledge of Salesforce Service Cloud, Commerce Cloud, Marketing Cloud
Solid understanding of API integration
Fundamental knowledge of data analytics, reporting and measuring KPIs
Strong communication skills, work independence, assertiveness, process orientation, self-driven
Ability to think “outside the box”Job Details
